articles.description: The NCAA's new posture on athlete compensation could create a new set of problems for college coaches.
articles.content:
Scott Satterfield is scared. He fears college football is on a collision course with dollar-driven free agency; that removing barriers to athlete compensation could embolden big-money boosters to start poaching his best players for rival schools.

articles.author: TMZ Staff
articles.title: Little League World Series Canceled for 1st Time Ever Over COVID-19 - TMZ
articles.description: The Little League World Series is officially canceled for the first time in the tournament's history.
articles.content:
We knew it was coming ... now it's official -- the Little League World Series is officially canceled for the first time in the tournament's history.
Thanks a lot, coronavirus.
The LLWS -- which is always played in August -- has been running without a hitch … [+1258 chars]
